page.title: 24Changes at the Churches
page.content:
The Parish Church is still very active onder the leadership of the Priest in Charge, Rev Lorraine Summers, the first woman incumbent. A large wall hanging was created as a community project to celebrate the Millennium and the Millennium Room was created.

The decision to close the Methodist Church was taken in 2008. It is now being converted into a private dwelling, under the constraints of the Conservation Area, by a local couple.

The Roman Catholic Mass in the Parish Church has been discontinued.
S.L.Ryder
